    static BigRational BigRational.getPHI​(int n)
    return the phi number(Golden mean) from serial PHI(n)=1+1/(1+phi(n-1)) up to n 1,618 033 988 749 894 848 204 586 834 365 638 117 720 309 179 805 762 862 135 448 622 705 260 462 189 024 497 072 072 041
